1: וֶאֱלִישָׁע֙ <sup>477 </sup> <n>And Elisha</n> הַנָּבִ֔יא <sup>5030 </sup> <n>the prophet</n> קָרָ֕א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>called</n> לְאַחַ֖ד <sup>259 </sup> <n>one</n> מִבְּנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the children</n> הַנְּבִיאִ֑ים <sup>5030 </sup> <n>of the prophets</n> וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> ל֜וֹ חֲגֹ֣ר <sup>2296 </sup> <n>unto him Gird up</n> מָתְנֶ֗יךָ <sup>4975 </sup> <n>thy loins</n> וְ֠קַח <sup>3947 </sup> <n>and take</n> פַּ֣ךְ <sup>6378 </sup> <n>this box</n> הַשֶּׁ֤מֶן <sup>8081 </sup> <n>of oil</n> הַזֶּה֙ <sup>2088 </sup> <n>this</n> בְּיָדֶ֔ךָ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>in thine hand</n> וְלֵ֖ךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>and go</n> רָמֹ֥ת <sup>7433 </sup> <n>to Ramoth-gilead</n> גִּלְעָֽד׃ <sup>1568 </sup> <n>Gilead</n>
2: וּבָ֖אתָ <sup>935 </sup> <n>And when thou comest</n> שָׁ֑מָּה <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> וּרְאֵֽה־ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>thither look out</n> שָׁ֠ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> יֵה֨וּא <sup>3058 </sup> <n>there Jehu</n> בֶן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> יְהוֹשָׁפָ֜ט <sup>3092 </sup> <n>of Jehoshaphat</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> נִמְשִׁ֗י <sup>5250 </sup> <n>of Nimshi</n> וּבָ֙אתָ֙ <sup>935 </sup> <n>and go in</n> וַהֲקֵֽמֹתוֹ֙ <sup>6965 </sup> <n>and make him arise up</n> מִתּ֣וֹך <sup>8432 </sup> <n>from among</n> אֶחָ֔יו <sup>251 </sup> <n>his brethren</n> וְהֵבֵיאתָ֥ <sup>935 </sup> <n>and carry</n> אֹת֖וֹ <sup>853 </sup> חֶ֥דֶר <sup>2315 </sup> <n>him to an inner</n> בְּחָֽדֶר׃ <sup>2315 </sup> <n>chamber</n>
3: וְלָקַחְתָּ֤ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>Then take</n> פַךְ־ <sup>6378 </sup> <n>the box</n> הַשֶּׁ֙מֶן֙ <sup>8081 </sup> <n>of oil</n> וְיָצַקְתָּ֣ <sup>3332 </sup> <n>and pour</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> רֹאשׁ֔וֹ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>[it] on his head</n> וְאָֽמַרְתָּ֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and say</n> כֹּֽה־ <sup>3541 </sup> <n>Thus</n> אָמַ֣ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Thus saith</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> מְשַׁחְתִּ֥יךָֽ <sup>4886 </sup> <n>I have anointed</n> לְמֶ֖לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>thee king</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>over</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>over Israel</n> וּפָתַחְתָּ֥ <sup>6605 </sup> <n>Then open</n> הַדֶּ֛לֶת <sup>1817 </sup> <n>the door</n> וְנַ֖סְתָּה <sup>5127 </sup> <n>and flee</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> תְחַכֶּֽה׃ <sup>2442 </sup> <n>and tarry</n>
4: וַיֵּ֧לֶךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>went</n> הַנַּ֛עַר <sup>5288 </sup> <n>So the young man</n> הַנַּ֥עַר <sup>5288 </sup> <n>[even] the young man</n> הַנָּבִ֖יא <sup>5030 </sup> <n>the prophet</n> רָמֹ֥ת <sup>7433 </sup> <n>to Ramoth-gilead</n> גִּלְעָֽד׃ <sup>1568 </sup> <n>Gilead</n>
5: וַיָּבֹ֗א <sup>935 </sup> <n>And when he came</n> וְהִנֵּ֨ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>behold</n> שָׂרֵ֤י <sup>8269 </sup> <n>behold the captains</n> הַחַ֙יִל֙ <sup>2428 </sup> <n>of the host</n> יֹֽשְׁבִ֔ים <sup>3427 </sup> <n>[were] sitting</n> וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>and he said</n> דָּבָ֥ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>I have an errand</n> לִ֛י אֵלֶ֖יךָ <sup>413 </sup> <n>for</n> הַשָּׂ֑ר <sup>8269 </sup> <n>to thee O captain</n> וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> יֵהוּא֙ <sup>3058 </sup> <n>And Jehu</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>for</n> מִ֣י <sup>4310 </sup> <n>which</n> מִכֻּלָּ֔נוּ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and he</n> וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Unto which of all us? And he said</n> אֵלֶ֥יךָ <sup>413 </sup> <n>for</n> הַשָּֽׂר׃ <sup>8269 </sup> <n>To thee O captain</n>
6: וַיָּ֙קָם֙ <sup>6965 </sup> <n>And he arose</n> וַיָּבֹ֣א <sup>935 </sup> <n>and went</n> הַבַּ֔יְתָה <sup>1004 </sup> <n>into the house</n> וַיִּצֹ֥ק <sup>3332 </sup> <n>and he poured</n> הַשֶּׁ֖מֶן <sup>8081 </sup> <n>the oil</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>over</n> רֹאשׁ֑וֹ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>on his head</n> וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> ל֗וֹ כֹּֽה־ <sup>3541 </sup> <n>Thus</n> אָמַ֤ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>unto him Thus saith</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֵ֣י <sup>430 </sup> <n>God</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> מְשַׁחְתִּ֧יךָֽ <sup>4886 </sup> <n>I have anointed</n> לְמֶ֛לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>thee king</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>over</n> עַ֥ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>over the people</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>over</n> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>[even] over Israel</n>
7: וְהִ֨כִּיתָ֔ה <sup>5221 </sup> <n>And thou shalt smite</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בֵּ֥ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>the house</n> אַחְאָ֖ב <sup>256 </sup> <n>of Ahab</n> אֲדֹנֶ֑יךָ <sup>113 </sup> <n>thy master</n> וְנִקַּמְתִּ֞י <sup>5358 </sup> <n>that I may avenge</n> דְּמֵ֣י ׀ <sup>1818 </sup> <n>the blood</n> עֲבָדַ֣י <sup>5650 </sup> <n>of my servants</n> הַנְּבִיאִ֗ים <sup>5030 </sup> <n>the prophets</n> וּדְמֵ֛י <sup>1818 </sup> <n>and the blood</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>of all</n> עַבְדֵ֥י <sup>5650 </sup> <n>of all the servants</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> מִיַּ֥ד <sup>3027 </sup> <n>at the hand</n> אִיזָֽבֶל׃ <sup>348 </sup> <n>of Jezebel</n>
8: וְאָבַ֖ד <sup>6 </sup> <n>shall perish</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>the whole</n> בֵּ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>For the whole house</n> אַחְאָ֑ב <sup>256 </sup> <n>of Ahab</n> וְהִכְרַתִּ֤י <sup>3772 </sup> <n>and I will cut off</n> לְאַחְאָב֙ <sup>256 </sup> <n>from Ahab</n> מַשְׁתִּ֣ין <sup>8366 </sup> <n>him that pisseth</n> בְּקִ֔יר <sup>7023 </sup> <n>against the wall</n> וְעָצ֥וּר <sup>6113 </sup> <n>and him that is shut up</n> וְעָז֖וּב <sup>5800 </sup> <n>and left</n> בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>in Israel</n>
9: וְנָֽתַתִּי֙ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>And I will make</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בֵּ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>the house</n> אַחְאָ֔ב <sup>256 </sup> <n>of Ahab</n> כְּבֵ֖ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>like the house</n> יָרָבְעָ֣ם <sup>3379 </sup> <n>of Jeroboam</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> נְבָ֑ט <sup>5028 </sup> <n>of Nebat</n> וּכְבֵ֖ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>and like the house</n> בַּעְשָׁ֥א <sup>1201 </sup> <n>of Baasha</n> בֶן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> אֲחִיָּֽה׃ <sup>281 </sup> <n>of Ahijah</n>

16: וַיִּרְכַּ֤ב <sup>7392 </sup> <n>rode in a chariot</n> יֵהוּא֙ <sup>3058 </sup> <n>So Jehu</n> וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>and went</n> יִזְרְעֶ֔אלָה <sup>3157 </sup> <n>to Jezreel</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> יוֹרָ֖ם <sup>3141 </sup> <n>for Joram</n> שֹׁכֵ֣ב <sup>7901 </sup> <n>lay</n> שָׁ֑מָּה <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> וַֽאֲחַזְיָה֙ <sup>274 </sup> <n>there And Ahaziah</n> מֶ֣לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>king</n> יְהוּדָ֔ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>of Judah</n> יָרַ֖ד <sup>3381 </sup> <n>was come down</n> לִרְא֥וֹת <sup>7200 </sup> <n>to see</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יוֹרָֽם׃ <sup>3141 </sup> <n>Joram</n>
17: וְהַצֹּפֶה֩ <sup>6822 </sup> <n>a watchman</n> עֹמֵ֨ד <sup>5975 </sup> <n>And there stood</n> עַֽל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> הַמִּגְדָּ֜ל <sup>4026 </sup> <n>on the tower</n> בְּיִזְרְעֶ֗אל <sup>3157 </sup> <n>in Jezreel</n> וַיַּ֞רְא <sup>7200 </sup> <n>and he spied</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שִׁפְעַ֤ת <sup>8229 </sup> <n>the company</n> יֵהוּא֙ <sup>3058 </sup> <n>of Jehu</n> בְּבֹא֔וֹ <sup>935 </sup> <n>as he came</n> וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> שִׁפְעַ֖ת <sup>8229 </sup> <n>a company</n> אֲנִ֣י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> רֹאֶ֑ה <sup>7200 </sup> <n>I see</n> וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> יְהוֹרָ֗ם <sup>3088 </sup> <n>And Joram</n> קַ֥ח <sup>3947 </sup> <n>Take</n> רַכָּ֛ב <sup>7395 </sup> <n>an horseman</n> וּֽשְׁלַ֥ח <sup>7971 </sup> <n>and send</n> לִקְרָאתָ֖ם <sup>7125 </sup> <n>to meet</n> וְיֹאמַ֥ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>them and let him say</n> הֲשָׁלֽוֹם׃ <sup>7965 </sup> <n>favor</n>
18: וַיֵּלֶךְ֩ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>went</n> רֹכֵ֨ב <sup>7392 </sup> <n>bring</n> הַסּ֜וּס <sup>5483 </sup> <n>crane</n> לִקְרָאת֗וֹ <sup>7125 </sup> <n>to meet</n> וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>him and said</n> כֹּֽה־ <sup>3541 </sup> <n>Thus</n> אָמַ֤ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Thus saith</n> הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>the king</n> הֲשָׁל֔וֹם <sup>7965 </sup> <n>favor</n> וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> יֵה֛וּא <sup>3058 </sup> <n>Jehu</n> מַה־ <sup>4100 </sup> <n>What</n> לְּךָ֥ וּלְשָׁל֖וֹם <sup>7965 </sup> <n>favor</n> סֹ֣ב <sup>5437 </sup> <n>make</n> אֶֽל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> אַחֲרָ֑י <sup>310 </sup> <n>thee behind</n> וַיַּגֵּ֤ד <sup>5046 </sup> <n>told</n> הַצֹּפֶה֙ <sup>6822 </sup> <n>me And the watchman</n> לֵאמֹ֔ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> בָּֽא־ <sup>935 </sup> <n>came</n> הַמַּלְאָ֥ךְ <sup>4397 </sup> <n>The messenger</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> הֵ֖ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> שָֽׁב׃ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>to them but he cometh not again</n>
19: וַיִּשְׁלַ֗ח <sup>7971 </sup> <n>Then he sent out</n> רֹכֵ֣ב <sup>7392 </sup> <n>bring</n> סוּס֮ <sup>5483 </sup> <n>crane</n> שֵׁנִי֒ <sup>8145 </sup> <n>a second</n> וַיָּבֹ֣א <sup>935 </sup> <n>which came</n> אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>to them and said</n> כֹּֽה־ <sup>3541 </sup> <n>Thus</n> אָמַ֥ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Thus saith</n> הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>the king</n> שָׁל֑וֹם <sup>7965 </sup> <n>favor</n> וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>answered</n> יֵה֛וּא <sup>3058 </sup> <n>Jehu</n> מַה־ <sup>4100 </sup> <n>What</n> לְּךָ֥ וּלְשָׁל֖וֹם <sup>7965 </sup> <n>favor</n> סֹ֥ב <sup>5437 </sup> <n>make</n> אֶֽל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> אַחֲרָֽי׃ <sup>310 </sup> <n>thee behind</n>
20: וַיַּגֵּ֤ד <sup>5046 </sup> <n>told</n> הַצֹּפֶה֙ <sup>6822 </sup> <n>And the watchman</n> לֵאמֹ֔ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> בָּ֥א <sup>935 </sup> <n>He came</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>even</n> אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> שָׁ֑ב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>even unto them and cometh not again</n> וְהַמִּנְהָ֗ג <sup>4491 </sup> <n>and the driving</n> כְּמִנְהַג֙ <sup>4491 </sup> <n>[is] like the driving</n> יֵה֣וּא <sup>3058 </sup> <n>of Jehu</n> בֶן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> נִמְשִׁ֔י <sup>5250 </sup> <n>of Nimshi</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> בְשִׁגָּע֖וֹן <sup>7697 </sup> <n>furiously</n> יִנְהָֽג׃ <sup>5090 </sup> <n>for he driveth</n>
21: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> יְהוֹרָם֙ <sup>3088 </sup> <n>And Joram</n> אֱסֹ֔ר <sup>631 </sup> <n>Make ready</n> וַיֶּאְסֹ֖ר <sup>631 </sup> <n>was made ready</n> רִכְבּ֑וֹ <sup>7393 </sup> <n>And his chariot</n> וַיֵּצֵ֣א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>went out</n> יְהוֹרָ֣ם <sup>3088 </sup> <n>And Joram</n> מֶֽלֶךְ־ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>king</n> יִ֠שְׂרָאֵל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> וַאֲחַזְיָ֨הוּ <sup>274 </sup> <n>and Ahaziah</n> מֶֽלֶךְ־ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>king</n> יְהוּדָ֜ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>of Judah</n> אִ֣ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>each</n> בְּרִכְבּ֗וֹ <sup>7393 </sup> <n>in his chariot</n> וַיֵּֽצְאוּ֙ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>and they went out</n> לִקְרַ֣את <sup>7125 </sup> <n>against</n> יֵה֔וּא <sup>3058 </sup> <n>Jehu</n> וַיִּמְצָאֻ֔הוּ <sup>4672 </sup> <n>and met</n> בְּחֶלְקַ֖ת <sup>2513 </sup> <n>him in the portion</n> נָב֥וֹת <sup>5022 </sup> <n>of Naboth</n> הַיִּזְרְעֵאלִֽי׃ <sup>3158 </sup> <n>the Jezreelite</n>
22: וַיְהִ֗י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> כִּרְא֤וֹת <sup>7200 </sup> <n>saw</n> יְהוֹרָם֙ <sup>3088 </sup> <n>And it came to pass when Joram</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יֵה֔וּא <sup>3058 </sup> <n>Jehu</n> וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>that he said</n> הֲשָׁל֣וֹם <sup>7965 </sup> <n>[Is it] peace</n> יֵה֑וּא <sup>3058 </sup> <n>Jehu</n> וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> מָ֣ה <sup>4100 </sup> <n>What</n> הַשָּׁל֔וֹם <sup>7965 </sup> <n>What peace</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>so long as</n> זְנוּנֵ֞י <sup>2183 </sup> <n>the whoredoms</n> אִיזֶ֧בֶל <sup>348 </sup> <n>Jezebel</n> אִמְּךָ֛ <sup>517 </sup> <n>of thy mother</n> וּכְשָׁפֶ֖יהָ <sup>3785 </sup> <n>and her witchcrafts</n> הָרַבִּֽים׃ <sup>7227 </sup> <n>in abundance</n>
23: וַיַּהֲפֹ֧ךְ <sup>2015 </sup> <n>turned</n> יְהוֹרָ֛ם <sup>3088 </sup> <n>And Joram</n> יָדָ֖יו <sup>3027 </sup> <n>his hands</n> וַיָּנֹ֑ס <sup>5127 </sup> <n>and fled</n> וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> אֲחַזְיָ֖הוּ <sup>274 </sup> <n>to Ahaziah</n> מִרְמָ֥ה <sup>4820 </sup> <n>[There is] treachery</n> אֲחַזְיָֽה׃ <sup>274 </sup> <n>O Ahaziah</n>
24: וְיֵה֞וּא <sup>3058 </sup> <n>And Jehu</n> מִלֵּ֧א <sup>4390 </sup> <n>with his full</n> יָד֣וֹ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>strength</n> בַקֶּ֗שֶׁת <sup>7198 </sup> <n>drew a bow</n> וַיַּ֤ךְ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>and smote</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יְהוֹרָם֙ <sup>3088 </sup> <n>Jehoram</n> בֵּ֣ין <sup>996 </sup> <n>between</n> זְרֹעָ֔יו <sup>2220 </sup> <n>between his arms</n> וַיֵּצֵ֥א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>went out</n> הַחֵ֖צִי <sup>2678 </sup> <n>and the arrow</n> מִלִּבּ֑וֹ <sup>3820 </sup> <n>at his heart</n> וַיִּכְרַ֖ע <sup>3766 </sup> <n>and he sunk down</n> בְּרִכְבּֽוֹ׃ <sup>7393 </sup> <n>in his chariot</n>

26: אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>lo</n> לֹ֡א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> דְּמֵ֣י <sup>1818 </sup> <n>the blood</n> נָבוֹת֩ <sup>5022 </sup> <n>of Naboth</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> דְּמֵ֨י <sup>1818 </sup> <n>and the blood</n> בָנָ֜יו <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of his sons</n> רָאִ֤יתִי <sup>7200 </sup> <n>Surely I have seen</n> אֶ֙מֶשׁ֙ <sup>570 </sup> <n>yesterday</n> נְאֻם־ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>saith</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> וְשִׁלַּמְתִּ֥י <sup>7999 </sup> <n>and I will requite</n> לְךָ֛ בַּחֶלְקָ֥ה <sup>2513 </sup> <n>thee in this plat</n> הַזֹּ֖את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n> נְאֻם־ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>saith</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> וְעַתָּ֗ה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>Now</n> שָׂ֧א <sup>5375 </sup> <n>Now therefore take</n> הַשְׁלִכֵ֛הוּ <sup>7993 </sup> <n>[and] cast</n> בַּחֶלְקָ֖ה <sup>2513 </sup> <n>him into the plat</n> כִּדְבַ֥ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>[of ground] according to the word</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n>
